abilities.name: Cut Throat
abilities.details: Every few seconds, Draevyn's basic attack reaps the enemy, causing them to bleed, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) over a duration.

abilities.name: Death Hook
abilities.details: Draevyn swings up his chain then throws the hook part at a target direction, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to the first enemy hit.[n]Death Hook also slightly [db]pulls[/] the target toward him and then briefly [db]slows[/] the target.

abilities.name: Slaughter Zone
abilities.details: Draevyn selects a target area and while he's inside, his basic attacks have increased [bf]range[/], deal additional [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) and [bf]heal[/] himself for a small amount.

abilities.name: The Hunt
abilities.details: Draevyn gains increased [ms]movement speed[/] and becomes [bf]camouflaged[/] for a duration. He will gain increased [as]attack speed[/] when exiting camouflage.[n]Takedown on enemy hero that Draevyn recently damaged will [bf]reset[/] The Hunt cooldown.[n]Draevyn can cast Slaughter Zone without revealing himself.

abilities.name: Death Knocks Twice
abilities.details: Draevyn slashes the chain in a large radius twice.[n]The first slash deals [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) and greatly [db]slows[/] all enemies hit.[n]The second slash deals [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] plus the target's [db]missing health[/]).[n]Enemies hit will be affected with Cut Throat and those who are already affected will have the duration reset.
